flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie
source_text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.
source_text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, I love ice cream and I really wish I could sing.
source_text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, I love ice cream and I really wish I could sing.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Say them to your partner or friends. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.
source_text: Say them to your partner or friends. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?
source_text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?
source_text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Crazy Chicken
source_text: Crazy Chicken

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Shake your hand in the air 8 times while counting
source_text: Shake your hand in the air 8 times while counting

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it as fast and loud as you can
source_text: Do it as fast and loud as you can

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Repeat with your other hand and both feet
source_text: Repeat with your other hand and both feet

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times until you get to 1.
source_text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times until you get to 1.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Call out “Crazy chicken” as loud as you can!
source_text: Call out “Crazy chicken” as loud as you can!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Have you released all your stress? If not, do it again even faster and louder!
source_text: Have you released all your stress? If not, do it again even faster and louder!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Family Work Out
source_text: Family Work Out

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Choose a sport or exercise to do together
source_text: Choose a sport or exercise to do together

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Decide on a schedule. Are you going to do it every day? For how long?
source_text: Decide on a schedule. Are you going to do it every day? For how long?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Try it out for a week.
source_text: Try it out for a week.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: At the end of the week, ask yourself and your family these questions. How´s it going? How did you feel at the start of the week? How do you feel at the end of the week? What can we do differently next week?
source_text: At the end of the week, ask yourself and your family these questions. How´s it going? How did you feel at the start of the week? How do you feel at the end of the week? What can we do differently next week?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Hello! How are you feeling? If you are feeling overwhelmed or stress, here's a fun activity that can also release some stress.
source_text: Hello! How are you feeling? If you are feeling overwhelmed or stress, here's a fun activity that can also release some stress.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Stand up and stretch your arms up to the sky. Push away any clouds and let the Sunshine of Positive Attention shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.
source_text: Stand up and stretch your arms up to the sky. Push away any clouds and let the Sunshine of Positive Attention shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from ankles, remember to turn to both sides. Do each foot with four circles in each direction
source_text: Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from ankles, remember to turn to both sides. Do each foot with four circles in each direction

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Now shake your whole body as fast as you can. Shake it up high! Shake it down low! Shake it all around!
source_text: Now shake your whole body as fast as you can. Shake it up high! Shake it down low! Shake it all around!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Let your hand hang by your side. Squeeze your shoulders tightly up to your ears as you breathe in, scrunch your eyes, and hold your breath. Release your shoulders as you relax your body.
source_text: Let your hand hang by your side. Squeeze your shoulders tightly up to your ears as you breathe in, scrunch your eyes, and hold your breath. Release your shoulders as you relax your body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out. Repeat 4 times.
source_text: Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out. Repeat 4 times.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Relax your arms and let them swing to the front and back. Take 4 deep breaths while you do this. This is good for your lower back.
source_text: Relax your arms and let them swing to the front and back. Take 4 deep breaths while you do this. This is good for your lower back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Relax your arms and let your arms to swing sideways, and turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.
source_text: Relax your arms and let your arms to swing sideways, and turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need to release stress and energise your mind and body.
source_text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need to release stress and energise your mind and body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: Stop & Listen
source_text: Stop & Listen

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Stop for a moment and close your eyes.
source_text: • Stop for a moment and close your eyes.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • How many sounds can you hear? Listen to sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers. (Pause for 10 seconds)
source_text: • How many sounds can you hear? Listen to sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers. (Pause for 10 seconds)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • How many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?
source_text: • How many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Let’s try again. Can you hear any new sounds this time? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body? (Pause for 10 seconds)
source_text: • Let’s try again. Can you hear any new sounds this time? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body? (Pause for 10 seconds)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Open your eyes. What new sounds did you hear?
source_text: • Open your eyes. What new sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: A Short Pause
source_text: A Short Pause

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Sit down and close your eyes
source_text: Sit down and close your eyes

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Listen to your breath as it goes in and out.
source_text: Listen to your breath as it goes in and out.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Notice how you feel.
source_text: Notice how you feel.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Take a few more deep breaths.
source_text: Take a few more deep breaths.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: When you are ready open your eyes again. Do you feel any different?
source_text: When you are ready open your eyes again. Do you feel any different?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Remind yourself that “Everything is ok”
source_text: Remind yourself that “Everything is ok”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Give Yourself A Hug
source_text: Give Yourself A Hug

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Bella mama, bella mama hey.
source_text: Bella mama, bella mama hey.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Hey there! How are you feeling today? Do you feel great?!
source_text: Hey there! How are you feeling today? Do you feel great?!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Maybe not. Maybe you shouted again at your children today? Maybe you got angry and said something you don't feel proud of? It’s ok. It’s super stressful right now.
source_text: Maybe not. Maybe you shouted again at your children today? Maybe you got angry and said something you don't feel proud of? It’s ok. It’s super stressful right now.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Take a deep breath and think of one thing you did today that you do feel proud of. It doesn't have to be big. And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug. And now think of one thing you did today that you don't feel proud of. What can you do differently tomorrow? And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug.
source_text: Take a deep breath and think of one thing you did today that you do feel proud of. It doesn't have to be big. And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug. And now think of one thing you did today that you don't feel proud of. What can you do differently tomorrow? And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama hey”.
source_text: Bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama hey”.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: Hello! Did you know that 3 is a magical number? Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three. How do you feel now? Do you feel any different?
source_text: Hello! Did you know that 3 is a magical number? Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three. How do you feel now? Do you feel any different?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: What are your three favourite foods? Can you name three things you can see right now? Can you hear three sounds you can hear right now? What are three things you are grateful for right now?
source_text: What are your three favourite foods? Can you name three things you can see right now? Can you hear three sounds you can hear right now? What are three things you are grateful for right now?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three? How do you feel now? Do you feel any different? Three is a magical number!
source_text: Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three? How do you feel now? Do you feel any different? Three is a magical number!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Release Some Energy
source_text: Release Some Energy

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Baba da bi da ba da baaa! Pause Power!
source_text: Baba da bi da ba da baaa! Pause Power!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: What’s Pause Power I hear you say? It’s the ability to transform from a grumpy, angry person into a calm, clear one.
source_text: What’s Pause Power I hear you say? It’s the ability to transform from a grumpy, angry person into a calm, clear one.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: When I’m feeling frustrated I plant my feet firmly on the ground and I breathe in and out three times as slowly as I can. Sometimes I imagine I’m smelling a flower and blowing out a candle.
source_text: When I’m feeling frustrated I plant my feet firmly on the ground and I breathe in and out three times as slowly as I can. Sometimes I imagine I’m smelling a flower and blowing out a candle.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Da ta! Pause Power! My transformation from grumpy to calm is complete!
source_text: Da ta! Pause Power! My transformation from grumpy to calm is complete!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Taking care of yourself
source_text: Taking care of yourself

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.
source_text: Here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?
source_text: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest.
source_text: Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: You can then say the following words silently to yourself:
source_text: You can then say the following words silently to yourself:

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: May I be peaceful.
source_text: May I be peaceful.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: May I be safe.
source_text: May I be safe.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: May I be healthy.
source_text: May I be healthy.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: May I be happy.
source_text: May I be happy.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: May there be love in my family.
source_text: May there be love in my family.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: May I feel loved.
source_text: May I feel loved.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need extra support.
source_text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need extra support.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Cooking together
source_text: Cooking together

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Children love to do what you do!
source_text: Children love to do what you do!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Let your baby play with pots and spoons while you are making dinner
source_text: Let your baby play with pots and spoons while you are making dinner

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Dance Party
source_text: Dance Party

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Put on your favourite music or sing your favourite song and dance around the room with your toddler. If you have a baby hold them while you dance.
source_text: Put on your favourite music or sing your favourite song and dance around the room with your toddler. If you have a baby hold them while you dance.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Dance in different ways or with different parts of your body
source_text: Dance in different ways or with different parts of your body

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: For example, “Dance like a monkey”, “Dance like a chicken” or “Let’s dance with our knees and hips”
source_text: For example, “Dance like a monkey”, “Dance like a chicken” or “Let’s dance with our knees and hips”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Think up different instructions. Be seriously playful!
source_text: Think up different instructions. Be seriously playful!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: When the music stops, everyone does a funny freeze
source_text: When the music stops, everyone does a funny freeze

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Notice what rhythms or movement they like!
source_text: Notice what rhythms or movement they like!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Down in a ditch!
source_text: Down in a ditch!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Sit on a chair and put your toddler on your lap facing you. Hold them firmly under the arms.
source_text: Sit on a chair and put your toddler on your lap facing you. Hold them firmly under the arms.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Gently bounce your legs and say in a soft voice “Baby horse, baby horse, baby horse, baby horse”
source_text: Gently bounce your legs and say in a soft voice “Baby horse, baby horse, baby horse, baby horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Bounce your legs a bit more and say a bit louder “Little horse, little horse, little horse, little horse”
source_text: Bounce your legs a bit more and say a bit louder “Little horse, little horse, little horse, little horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Bounce your legs more and say louder “Big horse, big horse, big horse, big horse”
source_text: Bounce your legs more and say louder “Big horse, big horse, big horse, big horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: When you call out “Down in a ditch!” open your knees and let your child drop down between them. Make sure you hold them so they don’t fall far!
source_text: When you call out “Down in a ditch!” open your knees and let your child drop down between them. Make sure you hold them so they don’t fall far!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Funny Faces
source_text: Funny Faces

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Look at your baby in the eyes and make different funny faces.
source_text: Look at your baby in the eyes and make different funny faces.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Make a big face. Make a small face. Make a happy face. Make a surprised face.
source_text: Make a big face. Make a small face. Make a happy face. Make a surprised face.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Which ones make your baby smile or laugh? Do them again, even bigger this time!
source_text: Which ones make your baby smile or laugh? Do them again, even bigger this time!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Play with different feelings and add sounds.
source_text: Play with different feelings and add sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Copy their facial expressions too. Exaggerate them to make them funny.
source_text: Copy their facial expressions too. Exaggerate them to make them funny.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Always end on a positive expression!
source_text: Always end on a positive expression!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: Mirror Game
source_text: Mirror Game

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • Get to your baby's level so they can see you and hear you.
source_text: • Get to your baby's level so they can see you and hear you.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • Copy their facial expressions and sounds.
source_text: • Copy their facial expressions and sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • It is so simple while creating a strong bond between you and your baby!
source_text: • It is so simple while creating a strong bond between you and your baby!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Musical Toes
source_text: Musical Toes

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Put your baby on their back
source_text: Put your baby on their back

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Wiggle their toe and say, “This little toe goes [funny sound]”
source_text: Wiggle their toe and say, “This little toe goes [funny sound]”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Make a funny sound for each toe
source_text: Make a funny sound for each toe

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Play with different sounds. For example, animal sounds, popping sounds, squeaky sounds, fart sounds.
source_text: Play with different sounds. For example, animal sounds, popping sounds, squeaky sounds, fart sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Repeat this for all ten toes.
source_text: Repeat this for all ten toes.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Try to make the last toe the biggest and funniest sound!
source_text: Try to make the last toe the biggest and funniest sound!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Peek a boo
text: Peek-a-Boo!
source_text: Peek-a-Boo!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Peek a boo
text: • Cover your face with your hands.
source_text: • Cover your face with your hands.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Peek a boo
text: • Quickly show your face and say "Peek-a-Boo!" or "Hello!" Babies love it!
source_text: • Quickly show your face and say "Peek-a-Boo!" or "Hello!" Babies love it!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: See It Be It
source_text: See It Be It

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup
source_text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it”
source_text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.
source_text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?
source_text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.
source_text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!
source_text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Shakers
source_text: Shakers

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Find an empty, clean plastic bottle or pot with a lid that closes tight.
source_text: Find an empty, clean plastic bottle or pot with a lid that closes tight.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Fill it with sand, stones, uncooked rice, beans or any small objects that make an interesting sound.
source_text: Fill it with sand, stones, uncooked rice, beans or any small objects that make an interesting sound.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Move your body as you shake it in front of your baby
source_text: Move your body as you shake it in front of your baby

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: If it is safe, give it to your baby to shake!
source_text: If it is safe, give it to your baby to shake!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Get creative! Can you find something colourful or try it with water?
source_text: Get creative! Can you find something colourful or try it with water?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: What sounds does your baby like?
source_text: What sounds does your baby like?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: The Sun is Coming!
source_text: The Sun is Coming!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Lie your baby on their back after washing them or changing their diaper
source_text: Lie your baby on their back after washing them or changing their diaper

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the sun is coming! Wiggle your fingers like sunrays above their head and make your face a big smiling sun.
source_text: Tell them the sun is coming! Wiggle your fingers like sunrays above their head and make your face a big smiling sun.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the wind is coming! Blow softly over their body.
source_text: Tell them the wind is coming! Blow softly over their body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the rain is coming! Use your fingers to gently pat over their whole body like light raindrops.
source_text: Tell them the rain is coming! Use your fingers to gently pat over their whole body like light raindrops.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tell them the clouds are coming! Wrap the towel or cloth around them like a blanket and cuddle them
source_text: Tell them the clouds are coming! Wrap the towel or cloth around them like a blanket and cuddle them

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Play with different weathers. Which one does your baby like best?
source_text: Play with different weathers. Which one does your baby like best?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Add sound effects or make it into a little song. Use the tune of another song you know!
source_text: Add sound effects or make it into a little song. Use the tune of another song you know!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the End of the Day
source_text: At the End of the Day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.
source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.
source_text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.
source_text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.
source_text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day

source_text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it

source_text: A fun active game where children learn different parts of a boat. Everyone must go to the place or activity that you call out

text: “Bow” means run to the front of the boat (room)
source_text: “Bow” means run to the front of the boat (room)

source_text: “Stern” means run to the back of the boat

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: “Starboard” means run to the right side and “Port” means run to the right side
source_text: “Starboard” means run to the right side and “Port” means run to the right side

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore

source_text: “Lifeboat, [number] people!”: hold hands in a circle with that many people and do knee bends

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore

source_text: The same as Ship to Shore but with Stage Directions: “Stage Right, Stage Left, Downstage, Upstage, Centre Stage.”

source_text: Ask your child “If you had the superpower to […] how would you use it?

source_text: Place an object in the center of the room and whenever someone has an idea, they jump in and show the rest what the object can be

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object

source_text: For example, a broom might be ridden as a horse or a microphone or a guitar!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: What Are You Doing?
source_text: What Are You Doing?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: This game is best when more than 2 people play
source_text: This game is best when more than 2 people play

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair or making dinner
source_text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair or making dinner

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Another person asks, “What are you doing?”
source_text: Another person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”
source_text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”
source_text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: The answer must always be something different than what you are actually doing!
source_text: The answer must always be something different than what you are actually doing!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Worms Go Home
source_text: Worms Go Home

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Lie on your tummies and pretend your index fingers are a wiggly worm.
source_text: Lie on your tummies and pretend your index fingers are a wiggly worm.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: With your other hand make a worm house by making a circle with your fingers and thumb and place it on the floor.
source_text: With your other hand make a worm house by making a circle with your fingers and thumb and place it on the floor.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Call out an instruction for your finger to touch, like “Worms on noses” or “Worms on ears”
source_text: Call out an instruction for your finger to touch, like “Worms on noses” or “Worms on ears”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: When you call out “Worms go home”, your wiggly worm has to find a worm house as quickly as possible.
source_text: When you call out “Worms go home”, your wiggly worm has to find a worm house as quickly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: The last worm to find a home calls out the instructions next.
source_text: The last worm to find a home calls out the instructions next.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Keep playing until you feel rejuvenated from lying down.
source_text: Keep playing until you feel rejuvenated from lying down.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day

source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day

source_text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Blind Dragon
source_text: Blind Dragon

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: This game is great if you have at least 4 people
source_text: This game is great if you have at least 4 people

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Tell the story about a ferocious dragon who lived near a village. He would sneak into the village at night and steal people’s treasures – anything they loved.  Anybody who tried to take their treasure back would be eaten alive.  This continued for many years until the dragon became old, fat, and blind from sitting on his treasure and gazing at the glare of the gold coins. Then the townspeople could try and sneak into his lair and steal back their relatives’ treasure.
source_text: Tell the story about a ferocious dragon who lived near a village. He would sneak into the village at night and steal people’s treasures – anything they loved.  Anybody who tried to take their treasure back would be eaten alive.  This continued for many years until the dragon became old, fat, and blind from sitting on his treasure and gazing at the glare of the gold coins. Then the townspeople could try and sneak into his lair and steal back their relatives’ treasure.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: One person plays the dragon. Dragon sits blindfolded or with eyes closed surrounded by a pile of treasure.
source_text: One person plays the dragon. Dragon sits blindfolded or with eyes closed surrounded by a pile of treasure.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Everyone has one piece of treasure that they must steal back.
source_text: Everyone has one piece of treasure that they must steal back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: If the dragon hears you and points at you, you must go back to the starting place.
source_text: If the dragon hears you and points at you, you must go back to the starting place.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Only one person can try to get the treasure at a time.
source_text: Only one person can try to get the treasure at a time.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Dancing with Angels

source_text: This activity helps children learn how to lead. It also builds trust between you and your child

source_text: Play a piece of music that is gentle and relaxed to encourage smooth and calming movement.

source_text: The guardian angel must protect the person with their eyes closed from harm while gently dancing together

source_text: Get some pens or crayons and a piece of paper or cardboard

source_text: Let your children freely whatever they want

source_text: While your child is drawing, use words to describe what they are doing: “I see you are drawing a person” or “I see you are making lines with the red crayon.”

source_text: Sit down and close your eyes

source_text: How many sounds can you hear? Listen to the sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers

source_text: Can you hear any new sounds? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body?

source_text: Notice how you feel and ask your child how they are feeling.

source_text: Start in a circle and pass one snap around the circle (or clap if you cannot snap)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: You snap once to throw the snap and once to catch it. Look at the person you are throwing to.
source_text: You snap once to throw the snap and once to catch it. Look at the person you are throwing to.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: The direction (up, down, straight, curved, rolling the ground) and force (hard, soft, medium) that you throw the snap should affect how the person catches it.
source_text: The direction (up, down, straight, curved, rolling the ground) and force (hard, soft, medium) that you throw the snap should affect how the person catches it.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: You can bounce the snap, throw it in the air, and catch it a few times before passing it.
source_text: You can bounce the snap, throw it in the air, and catch it a few times before passing it.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: When everyone gets good at this, you can start moving around the room, still passing the snap.
source_text: When everyone gets good at this, you can start moving around the room, still passing the snap.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap

text: Another person asks, “What are you doing?”

text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”
source_text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”
source_text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
